CustomField.description: Uses MS Access formulas to specify the source-to-dest data transformation. To concatenate text/values use the CONCAT function. eg. CONCAT(field1, " ", REPLACE(field2, "xx", "")). All fields referenced here must be from the Mapped Object
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Uses MS Access formulas to specify the source-to-dest data transformation. To concatenate text/values use the CONCAT function. eg. CONCAT(field1, " ", REPLACE(field2, "xx", "")). All fields referenced here must be from the Mapped Object
CustomField.label: Transform Instructions
